responses.text: What can you tell me about the Xenoids?

dynamic_line: I wonder what they look like under that mask they wear.
I got hit by one of their flettche projectiles a while back, if I didn't have some bandages I would have bleed out.
If you hear their weird radio, go in the opposite direction.
I always laugh when the blue crystal type-zombies attack the black ooze type-zombies.
I try to take them down quickly, because if you don't any damage you do will scab over in minutes, sometimes seconds.
